description: Queries the resources managed by Azure Resource Manager for all subscriptions specified in the request.

totalrecords.description: Number of total records matching the query.

count.description: Number of records returned in the current response. In the case of paging, this is the number of records in the current page.

resulttruncated.description: Indicates whether the query results are truncated.

skiptoken.description: When present, the value can be passed to a subsequent query call (together with the same query and subscriptions used in the current request) to retrieve the next page of data.

query.description: Request specifying query and its options.
